title: Introduction to Programming in Java
description: Learn Java programming from scratch. Master object-oriented programming, data structures, and algorithms using Java. Build real-world applications and prepare for a career in software development.

modules.title: Introduction to Java Programming
modules.description: Get started with Java programming language. Learn about its features, syntax, and basic programming concepts.

modules.title: Object-Oriented Programming in Java
modules.description: Master object-oriented programming concepts in Java including classes, objects, inheritance, and polymorphism.

content.description: Learn about classes and objects, the fundamental building blocks of object-oriented programming in Java.
